Successful investors never finance a project without a solid reason. That's where this course comes in! We will help you understand and develop the mentality of the greatest investors of our time.

courseDescription:
The great investor Warren Buffett likes to think that anyone actively involved in investing is winning over those who are not. Warren Buffett once said, "Success in investing doesn't correlate with IQ... what you need is the temperament to control the urges that get other people into trouble in investing." If you want to do well in investing, it's not about being smart, it's about how you think. Warren Buffet is correct in that it would be difficult to become a successful investor without the right mindset.

Changing your mindset is one of the most important steps on your path to wealth creation. In this course, you will learn from nine great global investors. We are going to debunk five deadly investing myths to free your mindset. Warren Buffett said, "It's good to learn from your mistakes. It's better to learn from other people's mistakes." Unfortunately, these blunders often cost amateur investors large sums of money. We have therefore put together more than twelve common mistakes you should avoid. 

The human mind is the most powerful 'supercomputer' on Earth. If you 'program' it correctly, it will help you tremendously but conversely will also hinder you if you have the wrong attitude. So why not go through this course carefully and adapt your perspective where necessary. By doing this, you will significantly increase your chance of success. Why delay? Enrol in this course today!
